summary: Diff adds a SmartBreak landing-page component set (Hero/Problem/Solution/How-It-Works/Technology/Simulation/Impact/About/Contact), basic in-view entrance animations, smooth-scroll usage in Hero/Header, and a backend method to create/list contact submissions. However, backend upgrade persistence is not implemented, some section headings/step text do not exactly match spec, and the backend includes additional user-profile/access-control features that were not requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: About/Research Background section title and provided description text must match the spec (verbatim or clearly equivalent).
missing_requirements.reason: The section heading is rendered as “Research Background” rather than the requested “About/Research Background”, and the paragraph text cannot be confirmed as the provided required text (only a newly written paragraph is shown).

missing_requirements.requirement: How It Works section must use the exact 6 steps text provided (in order).
missing_requirements.reason: The step titles/descriptions are similar but not an exact match to the required phrases (e.g., 'Voltage loss detected' + 'At consumer end' vs the exact combined step text; other steps are shortened).

missing_requirements.requirement: Contact submissions must persist across canister upgrades using the template’s standard stable-state pattern.
missing_requirements.reason: Contact submissions are stored in a non-stable `var contactSubmissions = List.empty<ContactSubmission>()` with no visible `stable` storage or `preupgrade/postupgrade` logic in the shown backend file.

hallucinated_features.description: User profile storage and access-controlled profile APIs (get/save profiles) added to backend.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest is for a marketing site with a contact form; it explicitly notes no user accounts/dashboards. Backend includes user profile types and methods unrelated to contact submissions.

hallucinated_features.description: Admin/authorization system initialization and permission checks added around backend endpoints.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest did not request an authorization framework; only required create + list submissions. The diff adds AccessControl/MixinAuthorization and restricts listing to admins.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer contains external promotional link to caffeine.ai with referral parameters.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in the BuildRequest; marketing site requirements did not mention adding third-party promotional links.
